categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars: The Old Republic
Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Eorn was a female Miraluka Jedi Master stationed on Tython during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. Eorn served as a Jedi Consular and combat instructor.
Eorn appears in the game files for Star Wars: The Old Republic. She was originally going to serve as a Jedi Consular trainer but the content was cut. Eorn's file can be found on Jedipedia database.
